snippet: The average prices for new homes in China's 70 major cities dropped 5.7 percent last month from a year ago, but prices are expected to recover slowly.
lead_paragraph: The average prices for new homes in China's 70 major cities dropped 5.7 percent last month from a year ago, but prices are expected to recover slowly.

headline.main: Home Prices Decline at Record Pace in China
headline.print_headline: Home Prices Decline at Record Pace in China
